text: The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) is a modern art museum in New York, New York, United States, on 53rd Street between Fifth and Sixth Avenues. It has been called the most important museum of modern art in the world. Some of the artists featured at the museum include Jackson Pollock, Vincent van Gogh, Andy Warhol and Robert Indiana. == References == == Other websites == * Museum of Modern Art official site * Abby Aldrich Rockefeller: Patron of the modern * New York Times, 2007: Donors Sweetened Director's Pay At MoMA, Prompting Questions Controversy over the compensation package of MoMA's Director, Glenn D. Lowry. * Taniguchi and the New MOMA * Museum Conservation Lab Renovation Category:Art museums in the United States Category:Museums in Manhattan
title: Museum of Modern Art
